title: Toledo councilman introduces resolution to draft AI strategy for city
description: With artificial intelligence on the rise, one Toledo city councilman wants to make sure the city is being proactive in its approach to using the up-and-coming, yet largely unknown, technology.

title: Playtika cuts 15% of its workforce amid shift to leaner teams that rely on AI
description: Israeli-founded online gaming developer lays off about 500 of its employees in Israel and abroad to invest in a pipeline of new games and focus on talent densityThe post Playtika cuts 15% of its workforce amid shift to leaner teams that rely on AI appeared first on The Times of Israel.

title: McKinsey challenges graduates to master AI tools as it shifts hiring hunt toward liberal arts majors
description: CEO Bob Sternfels says the company has 60,000 employees—including 20,000 AI agents.

title: British PM says "will not back down" on X's Grok AI issue
description: LONDON, Jan. 14 (Xinhua) -- British Prime Minister Keir Starmer said on Wednesday that the United Kingdom "will not back down" on the issue of X's AI chatbot Grok, declaring that the government "will take necessary measures" to ensure the platform complies with British law. Starmer described the actions of Grok as "disgusting" and "shameful," and criticized the decision to make it a premium service as "horrific.

title: Datavault AI Announces it has Developed Patented AI Rating Technology Launching Globally with Fintech.TV in Pilot Season
description: Datavault AI Announces it has Developed Patented AI Rating Technology Launching Globally with Fintech.TV in Pilot SeasonIntroducing AI Content Detection, Real-Time Bias Meter and Breakthrough Interactive Polling Powered by ADIO®PHILADELPHIA, PENNSYLVANIA / ACCESS Newswire / January 14, 2026 /...
